 3  sgeinstall_template = """ 
 4  SGE_CLUSTER_NAME="starcluster" 
 5  SGE_ROOT="/opt/sge6" 
 6  SGE_QMASTER_PORT="63231" 
 7  SGE_EXECD_PORT="63232" 
 8  SGE_ENABLE_SMF="false" 
 9  CELL_NAME="default" 
10  ADMIN_USER="" 
11  QMASTER_SPOOL_DIR="/opt/sge6/default/spool/qmaster" 
12  EXECD_SPOOL_DIR="/opt/sge6/default/spool" 
13  GID_RANGE="20000-20100" 
14  SPOOLING_METHOD="classic" 
15  DB_SPOOLING_SERVER="none" 
16  DB_SPOOLING_DIR="/opt/sge6/default/spooldb" 
17  PAR_EXECD_INST_COUNT="20" 
18  ADMIN_HOST_LIST="%s" 
19  SUBMIT_HOST_LIST="%s" 
20  EXEC_HOST_LIST="%s" 
21  EXECD_SPOOL_DIR_LOCAL="/opt/sge6/default/spool/exec_spool_local" 
22  HOSTNAME_RESOLVING="true" 
23  SHELL_NAME="ssh" 
24  COPY_COMMAND="scp" 
25  DEFAULT_DOMAIN="none" 
26  ADMIN_MAIL="none@none.edu" 
27  ADD_TO_RC="false" 
28  SET_FILE_PERMS="true" 
29  RESCHEDULE_JOBS="wait" 
30  SCHEDD_CONF="1" 
31  SHADOW_HOST="" 
32  EXEC_HOST_LIST_RM="" 
33  REMOVE_RC="true" 
34  WINDOWS_SUPPORT="false" 
35  WIN_ADMIN_NAME="Administrator" 
36  WIN_DOMAIN_ACCESS="false" 
37  CSP_RECREATE="false" 
38  CSP_COPY_CERTS="false"

40  CSP_STATE="MA" 
41  CSP_LOCATION="BOSTON"

44  CSP_MAIL_ADDRESS="none@none.edu" 
45  """

47  sge_pe_template = """ 
48  pe_name           %s 
49  slots             %s 
50  user_lists        NONE 
51  xuser_lists       NONE 
52  start_proc_args   /bin/true 
53  stop_proc_args    /bin/true 
54  allocation_rule   $round_robin 
55  control_slaves    TRUE 
56  job_is_first_task FALSE 
57  urgency_slots     min 
58  accounting_summary FALSE 
59  """

61  sgeprofile_template = """ 
62  export SGE_ROOT="/opt/sge6" 
63  export SGE_CELL="default" 
64  export SGE_CLUSTER_NAME="starcluster" 
65  export SGE_QMASTER_PORT="63231" 
66  export SGE_EXECD_PORT="63232" 
67  export MANTYPE="man" 
68  export MANPATH="$MANPATH:$SGE_ROOT/man" 
69  export PATH="$PATH:$SGE_ROOT/bin/%(arch)s" 
70  export ROOTPATH="$ROOTPATH:$SGE_ROOT/bin/%(arch)s" 
71  export LDPATH="$LDPATH:$SGE_ROOT/lib/%(arch)s" 
72  """
